Class Robot

java.lang.Object
Robot
public class Robot extends Object
The class Robot allows the user to create a Robot. A robot can move and the color of his body can be set. A robot has a position defined by x,y and evolve in one world. It is drawn by CanvasRobot.
Version:
2022.10
Author:
Group7

  • Constructor Details

    • Robot

      public Robot(String name, String color)
      Robot Constructor - Creates a new robot. The robot is drawn with a new CanvasRobot.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the Robot
      color - the color of the body

    • Robot

      public Robot(String name, int x, int y, String color, World w)
      Robot Constructor - Creates a new robot. The robot is drawn with a new CanvasRobot.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the Robot
      x - ,y position of the Robot
      color - the color of the body
      w - world where the robot exists

  • Method Details

    • setYPosition

      public void setYPosition(int y)
      Set the Y position of the robot. If the position if too big, the position is set to the maximum position If the position if too little, the position is set to the minimum position
      Parameters:
      y - vertical position of the robot

    • setXPosition

      public void setXPosition(int x)
      Set the X position of the robot. If the position if too big, the position is set to the maximum position If the position if too little, the position is set to the minimum position
      Parameters:
      x - horizontal position of the robot

    • getYPosition

      public int getYPosition()
      Get the Y position of the robot.
      Returns:
      the Y position of the Robot

    • getXPosition

      public int getXPosition()
      Get the X position of the robot.
      Returns:
      the X position of the Robot

    • setDirection

      public void setDirection(int d)
      Set the direction of the robot.
      Parameters:
      d - direction of the robot

    • getDirection

      public int getDirection()
      Get the direction of the robot.
      Returns:
      The direction of the robot

    • getWorld

      public World getWorld()
      Get the world of the robot.
      Returns:
      The world of the robot

    • setName

      public void setName(String name)
      Set the name of the robot. The spaces in the name are deleted. If the name of the robot is long enought, the new name is set. Else, a automatic name is set.
      Parameters:
      name - new name of the robot

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Get the name of the robot.
      Returns:
      The name of the robot

    • getColourBody

      public String getColourBody()
      Get the color of the robot.
      Returns:
      The color of the robot

    • getCanvasRobot

      public CanvasRobot getCanvasRobot()
      Get the canvasRobot of the robot.
      Returns:
      The canvasRobot of the robot

    • setColourBody

      public void setColourBody(String colourBody)
      Set the color of the body of the robot. Check if the new color exists. If not, the color is set to blue.
      Parameters:
      colourBody - the color of the robot

    • setColourHead

      public void setColourHead(String colourHead)
      Set the color of the head of the robot. Check if the new color exists. If not, the color is set to red.
      Parameters:
      colourHead - the color of the head of the robot

    • setColourEye

      public void setColourEye(String colourEye)
      Set the color of the eyes of the robot. Check if the new color exists. If not, the color is set to blue.
      Parameters:
      colourEye - the color of the eyes of the robot

    • isColourFound

      public boolean isColourFound(String newColor)
      Check if the color exists Set the color to upper case Check in the list of colors if the color is present Return true if the color exists
      Parameters:
      newColor - the new color wanted
      Returns:
      true if the color exists, else, false

    • move

      public void move()
      The movement of the robot. The robot increases its x and y position. It is the movement by default. The robot is redrawn at this position.

    • redraw

      public void redraw()
      The robot is redrawn at the new position.

    • isOnBorder

      public boolean isOnBorder(int value)
      Check if the robot is on a border.
      Parameters:
      value - the coordinate to check
      Returns:
      true if the robot is on border, else, false

    • getMaxPosition

      public static int getMaxPosition()
      Get the maximum position. It is a static method.
      Returns:
      the maximum position

    • getMinPosition

      public static int getMinPosition()
      Get the minimum position. It is a static method.
      Returns:
      the minimum position

    • randomDirection

      public void randomDirection()
      Set a random direction to the robot. Pick a random value between 0 and 3. This value is assigned to the direction of the robot.
